title: Cheese and bacon potato soup
ingredients: ['4 baking potatoes', '150g butter', '85g plain flour', '1.5 litres milk', '100g spring onions, chopped', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '12 rashers streaky bacon, cooked and crumbled', '150g Cheddar cheese, grated', '225ml soured cream']
